General.Name: Banca Mediolanum SpA
General.Description: Banca Mediolanum S.p.A. provides various banking products and services in Italy. The company offers current accounts; deposits; and mortgages and loans. It also provides debit, credit, and prepaid cards; investment products, such as mutual funds, unit linked policies, investment strategies, other investments, trading, and retirement products; and life insurance products and services. In addition, the company engages in audio and television production business; real estate business; mutual fund and trust management business; and the provision of damage insurance, financial intermediation, and payment services. Banca Mediolanum S.p.A. founded in 1982 and is headquartered in Basiglio, Italy.
